00008 b3FixedConstraint::b3FixedConstraint(int rbA,int rbB, const b3Transform& frameInA,const b3Transform& frameInB)
00009 :b3TypedConstraint(B3_FIXED_CONSTRAINT_TYPE,rbA,rbB)
00010 {
00011         m_pivotInA = frameInA.getOrigin();
00012         m_pivotInB = frameInB.getOrigin();
00013         m_relTargetAB = frameInA.getRotation()*frameInB.getRotation().inverse();
00014 
00015 }

00028 void b3FixedConstraint::getInfo2 (b3ConstraintInfo2* info, const b3RigidBodyData* bodies)
00029 {
00030         //fix the 3 linear degrees of freedom
00031 
00032         const b3Vector3& worldPosA = bodies[m_rbA].m_pos;
00033         const b3Quaternion& worldOrnA = bodies[m_rbA].m_quat;
00034         const b3Vector3& worldPosB= bodies[m_rbB].m_pos;
00035         const b3Quaternion& worldOrnB = bodies[m_rbB].m_quat;
00036 
00037         info->m_J1linearAxis[0] = 1;
00038         info->m_J1linearAxis[info->rowskip+1] = 1;
00039         info->m_J1linearAxis[2*info->rowskip+2] = 1;
00040 
00041         b3Vector3 a1 = b3QuatRotate(worldOrnA,m_pivotInA);
00042         {
00043                 b3Vector3* angular0 = (b3Vector3*)(info->m_J1angularAxis);
00044                 b3Vector3* angular1 = (b3Vector3*)(info->m_J1angularAxis+info->rowskip);
00045                 b3Vector3* angular2 = (b3Vector3*)(info->m_J1angularAxis+2*info->rowskip);
00046                 b3Vector3 a1neg = -a1;
00047                 a1neg.getSkewSymmetricMatrix(angular0,angular1,angular2);
00048         }
00049     
00050         if (info->m_J2linearAxis)
00051         {
00052                 info->m_J2linearAxis[0] = -1;
00053                 info->m_J2linearAxis[info->rowskip+1] = -1;
00054                 info->m_J2linearAxis[2*info->rowskip+2] = -1;
00055         }
00056         
00057         b3Vector3 a2 = b3QuatRotate(worldOrnB,m_pivotInB);
00058    
00059         {
00060         //      b3Vector3 a2n = -a2;
00061                 b3Vector3* angular0 = (b3Vector3*)(info->m_J2angularAxis);
00062                 b3Vector3* angular1 = (b3Vector3*)(info->m_J2angularAxis+info->rowskip);
00063                 b3Vector3* angular2 = (b3Vector3*)(info->m_J2angularAxis+2*info->rowskip);
00064                 a2.getSkewSymmetricMatrix(angular0,angular1,angular2);
00065         }
00066 
00067     // set right hand side for the linear dofs
00068         b3Scalar k = info->fps * info->erp;
00069         b3Vector3 linearError = k*(a2+worldPosB-a1-worldPosA);
00070     int j;
00071         for (j=0; j<3; j++)
00072     {
00073         info->m_constraintError[j*info->rowskip] = linearError[j];
00074                 //printf("info->m_constraintError[%d]=%f\n",j,info->m_constraintError[j]);
00075     }
00076 
00077                 //fix the 3 angular degrees of freedom
00078 
00079         int start_row = 3;
00080         int s = info->rowskip;
00081     int start_index = start_row * s;
00082 
00083     // 3 rows to make body rotations equal
00084         info->m_J1angularAxis[start_index] = 1;
00085     info->m_J1angularAxis[start_index + s + 1] = 1;
00086     info->m_J1angularAxis[start_index + s*2+2] = 1;
00087     if ( info->m_J2angularAxis)
00088     {
00089         info->m_J2angularAxis[start_index] = -1;
00090         info->m_J2angularAxis[start_index + s+1] = -1;
00091         info->m_J2angularAxis[start_index + s*2+2] = -1;
00092     }
00093 
00094 
00095     // set right hand side for the angular dofs
00096 
00097         b3Vector3 diff;
00098         b3Scalar angle;
00099         b3Quaternion qrelCur = worldOrnA *worldOrnB.inverse();
00100 
00101         b3TransformUtil::calculateDiffAxisAngleQuaternion(m_relTargetAB,qrelCur,diff,angle);
00102         diff*=-angle;
00103         for (j=0; j<3; j++)
00104     {
00105         info->m_constraintError[(3+j)*info->rowskip] = k * diff[j];
00106     }
00107 
00108 }
